fun gaem

Поначалу игра понравилась, но это впечатление быстро сошло на нет, после нескольких ущербных механик: когда выживший снимает с крюка другого выжившего и при этом снимающего хуярит ман, НИКАКОГО УРОНА НЕТ, то есть оглушение после удара остаётся, а выжившему похуй, и они оба сбегают. Одним словом, АХУЕННО; когда я играл за мана и нокал челика, поднимал его, чтобы повесить, другой уебан вставал перед крюком, недавая мне повесить челика, таким образом я проебал ОДНОГО И ТОГО ЖЕ пидораса дважды. Из-за этого случая кста я проебал катку, убив 3 выживших, а не 4(самое забавное, что тот уебан, который юзал эту ебанину остался жив)
Вывод: Игра охренительная, но в тоже время, наполнена огромным количеством тупорылых механик

game sucjks

edit: the game still sucks

While I haven't played nearly as many hours as other people, I've played enough that I think I can safely say this game is not fun. You can definitely invent your own fun in it. It will let you do that. But it will judge you for it. And over time it will grind you into powder unless you have fun the specific way it wants you to. The second you realize that: please stop playing.

Because that fun you're having? You'll come to realize that it's often at the expense of other people's fun. Every time you beat a match very quickly because you used a whole bunch of very strong items and abilities? Turns out another player was trying to just get by. That new combo that tunnels someone out of the game? Oops: they were just playing for points. 

At first you'll get a big adrenaline rush from squeaking out an escape or win. But then you realize the game doesn't really know what a win is. And then the company that makes the game will post about how much they love NFTs. I can't underline how much that put a bullet in my enjoyment of this game. I was making guides to help people get into this game, excited for a Halloween in this new horror game I liked. Then boom: Pinhead NFT. Followed quickly by a very, very boring halloween event.

It really put a bow on an experience I started loving but lost all joy in so quickly. This isn't a horror game. It's mmo freeze tag with a horror skin. Every drop of fun you get from it will require so much work. And eventually you'll look at your hour count and think: am I having fun? Or am I just...depressed in the middle of a pandemic?

For me, it was the latter.

[h1] Should me or my friends get Dead by Daylight? [/h1]
[b] Here's what I say... [/b]

I personally have a deep place in my heart for this game. My friend showed it to me at first and I had some interest in this game. Until I bought it however was when I got addicted to it. The killers that chase you as you rush to complete generators. The perks that certain characters or killers may have. Believe me, this game is worth the $21 (aud). To explain the game better, In a game you spawn in a map with other survivors as the killer tries to kill you. Every time you get knocked down by the killer you get put on a hook where other survivors try to get you off without the killer noticing. Too many times on the hook and you could be officially killed. However, if everyone can complete five generators on the map you can open the exit gate and escape the killer. The more you participate the more Bloodpoints you receive. Bloodpoints is a currency used in the game to unlock perks for a survivor or killer. Watching the trailer at first kinda scared me but when you play it, it's less scary and more fun instead. I personally rate this game 10/10 as it never gets old and forces me to think strategically. However, I recommend playing with a friend.
